commits.message: GUI-337: Add choices for ec2:VolumeType condition in a policy statement
GUI-337: Display checkbox when condition key expects a boolean or if condition operator is Null

Merge pull request #272 from eucalyptus/GUI-337

GUI-337: IAM Policy Generator - Selective display of operators for conditions
GUI-337: Flatten conditions object into an array of conditions to facilitate listing/removal of existing conditions by operator/key/value uniqueness per policy statement

GUI-337: Contextual wording for "Set resource (ARN)" based on presence of existing resources within statement.  Select "Allow" effect when adding a resource and neither allow or deny is selected to prevent unexpected alert dialog.
GUI-337: Add availability zone choices to policy generator

Merge pull request #213 from eucalyptus/add_policy_title

GUI-337: Insert title for Add Policy page
GUI-337: Add security group choices to the policy generator
GUI-337: Refactor options passed to initController, since there's going to be a bunch for the policy wizard
GUI-337: Add IAM actions to policy generator

Merge pull request #190 from eucalyptus/GUI-337

GUI-337: Initial Progress on IAM Policy Wizard
GUI-337: Experiment with IAM policy live preview
GUI-337: Fetch selected canned policy and populate textarea in step 3 of policy wizard.

Merge pull request #294 from eucalyptus/GUI-337

GUI-337: IAM Policy Generator - Context-specific widgets based on condition keys and operators

Merge pull request #279 from eucalyptus/GUI-337

GUI-337: IAM Policy Generator - Selective display of condition keys based on actions
GUI-337: Conditionally display the appropriate operators based on the selected key.  Generic AWS keys should be prefixed with "aws:" rather than "ec2:"
GUI-337: Another fix to avoid race conditions for chosen widgets in policy statements
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-337
GUI-337: Allow multiple resource per action to be added and/or removed.
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-337
GUI-337: Gracefully handle cases where an action may involve more than one resource type (e.g. AttachVolume pertains to an instance or a volume).
GUI-337: Better colors for allow/deny marks in policy generator
GUI-337: Enable resource (* or ARN) to be set for all actions (except ELB and AutoScaling)
GUI-337: Add ELB actions to IAM policy generator
GUI-337: More style tweaks for policy generator.
GUI-337: Enable CodeMirror to allow policy edits in a textarea to be far less painful.
GUI-337: Add choices for ec2:RootDeviceType condition key
GUI-337: Add availability zone selector to conditions, switching to plain input field when "Like" operators are selected.
GUI-337: Add numeric condition test for volume-related condition keys.  Add minor optimization to avoid calling getConditionType check unless necessary.
GUI-337: Display added conditions, and allow them to be removed
GUI-337: Prep work for adding conditions to a policy statement
GUI-337: Better handling of allow/deny statements when all resources (for all resource types) are selected for a given action.
GUI-337: Set proper label/value for vm type choices passed to policy generator.
GUI-337: Insert title for Add Policy page
GUI-337: Pass snapshot choices to policy generator
GUI-337: Allow policy file upload, leveraging FileReader API
GUI-337: Use "All resources" placeholder text instead of an asterisk in the resource input field when specifying a resource for a given action in a policy statement.

Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-337

Conflicts:
	koala/routes.py
GUI-337: Cleaner approach for updating policy statements.
GUI-337: Hard-coded canned access policies for IAM Policy Wizard.
GUI-337: Add options for ec2:Tenancy condition key in a policy statement
GUI-337: Display text input when the condition operator starts with "Arn"

Merge pull request #274 from eucalyptus/GUI-337-patch

GUI-337: Add numeric condition test for volume-related condition keys.
GUI-337: Fix potential race condition w.r.t. chosen widget initialization in the policy statement drop-downs
GUI-337: Style added resources with a minus circle to remove rather than an 'x' mark.  Need special handling to set the ARN for an IP address since it's a text input field.
GUI-337: Refactor "all" resource choices to limit scope to all of a given resource type rather than all resources across all resource types.
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-337
GUI-337: Refactor building the arn prefix for resources to keep things DRY
GUI-337: Add resource type selector and display the appropriate options based on the selected action (e.g. only display "Instance" in drop-down for instance-related actions).
GUI-337: Initial progress on incorporating resource type selectors in advanced options of policy generator.
GUI-337: Add S3/Walrus actions for IAM policy generator
GUI-337: Redirect to appropriate place if we're adding a policy for a user or a group.
GUI-337: Configure list of possible permission actions for EC2 and Autoscaling and expose the lists in the policy generator as expandos
GUI-337: Initial progress on IAM Policy Wizard
GUI-337: Add input for numeric condition values (e.g. VolumeSize).
GUI-337: Add snapshot choices widget to conditions
GUI-337: Quick fix to allow condition key/operator pairs to be removed when the condition value isn't truthy.
GUI-337: Avoid clobbering existing operator conditions when a new key/value is added to the operator in a policy statement.
GUI-337: Reinstate namespace for policy actions.  Pull "Add conditions" section out of resource scope, since they are orthogonal.
GUI-337: Refactor how the policy statements are generated for each action to better handle multiple resources per action.
GUI-337: Allow allow/deny policy statements to be removed by clicking the check or x-mark a second time.
GUI-337: Add utility function to show resource selector in policy generator only when it makes sense for a given action.
GUI-337: Pass images to add resource selector in policy generator.  Hide availability zone resource type option for now.

GUI-337: Redirect to user or group detail page after a policy has been added.  Remove resource_type form field to prevent validation errors--going to build the resource type drop-downs via Angular instead.
GUI-337: Add CloudWatch actions to IAM policy generator
GUI-337: Minor style updates for policy generator
GUI-337: List of possible EC2 actions for policy generator.
GUI-337: Navigate to appropriate target based on choice in step 1 of policy wizard
GUI-337: Avoid displaying context-specific widgets unless a condition key and operator are selected.
GUI-337: Add instance type choices to conditions
GUI-337: Map tenancy condition key to string value

GUI-337: IAM Policy Generator - Conditions
GUI-337: Add choices for condition keys and operators
GUI-337: Hide IAM tiles on dashboard and IAM links in top nav when logged into AWS
GUI-337: Better handling of allow/deny all actions for a given namespace.  Allow allow/deny all statements to be removed on subsequent clicks of checkmark or x-mark.
GUI-337: Pass vm type choices to IAM policy generator

Merge pull request #208 from eucalyptus/GUI-337

GUI-337: IAM Policy Generator
GUI-337: GUI-337: Pass volume choices to volume resource selector in policy generator.  Refacctor the tal:condition statements in the template for reuse.
GUI-337: Rework IAM Policy Wizard to be consistent with revamped wireframe, now that we're keeping the policy text "live preview" feature.
GUI-337: Add STS actions to policy generator
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-337
Merge branch 'develop' into GUI-337
GUI-337: Add volume choices for ec2:ParentVolume condition key, applicable to ec2:RunInstances action
GUI-337: Add image type picker for conditions, setting appropriate choices based on Euca or AWS

GUI-337: Only display EC2-specific condition keys for their respective actions per AWS docs.

Relevant AWS docs are at http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/iam-policies-for-amazon-ec2.html#ec2-supported-iam-actions-resources
GUI-337: Prevent long resource names from exploding table.  Rework layout of conditions fields now that we have a bit more space
GUI-337: Allow conditions to be added to a policy statement

Merge pull request #220 from eucalyptus/GUI-337

GUI-337: IAM Policy Generator - Resource selection

GUI-337: Save last selected tab in Add Policy page in browser's localStorage
GUI-337: Add key pairs to policy generator choices
GUI-337: Pass instance choices to instance resource selector in policy generator

GUI-337: Allow policies to be saved for a given user or group.
